abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews American premiere of La Monte Young work The Melodic Version (1984) of the Second Dream of the High Tension Line Stepdown Transformer, performed by Theater of Eternal Music Brass and String Ensemble at Dia: Chelsea's Dream House.
lead_paragraph: Four cellists and eight trumpeters performed a 90-minute work by the Minimalist composer within “Dream House,” a four-walled installation at Dia Chelsea.

headline.main: Review: License and Restriction in a Work by La Monte Young at Dia Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Rendering a Mixed Message of License and Restriction

snippet: Four cellists and eight trumpeters performed a 90-minute work by the Minimalist composer within “Dream House,” a four-walled installation at Dia Chelsea.
